bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: PI, a mixture of pus with watery secretions. Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 21: 凡消渴病經百日以上， 不得灸刺，灸刺則於瘡上漏膿水不歇 , “Patients who have had melting-withthirst disease for more than one hundred days cannot be cauterized or treated with needling. If they are subjected to cauterization or piercing, this will result in unending flow of pus and water from above the sores”. When the Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 speaks of “pus and water” it mostly refers to matter discharged from local lesions.
